title: Kirpa police arrest suspect for murdering brother-in-law
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 22 (APP):Islamabad Capital Territory (ICT) Kirpa Police Station team, in collaboration with the Homicide Investigation Unit (HIU), conducted a swift and successful operation leading to the arrest of a murder suspect.

An official told APP on Wednesday that the accused, identified as Nadeem Baig, had allegedly killed his brother-in-law, Shehzad, using a sharp-edged weapon within the jurisdiction of Kirpa Police Station.

The police, utilizing modern investigative techniques and scientific evidence, traced and apprehended the accused in a short span of time. The murder case had caused considerable concern in the local community, prompting immediate action by law enforcement.

According to police sources, the accused has been taken into custody for further interrogation to determine the motive behind the crime.

DIG Islamabad Muhammad Jawad Tariq appreciated the efforts of the Kirpa and HIU teams for their professionalism and timely action, reaffirming that Islamabad Police remain fully committed to ensuring justice and maintaining peace across the capital.
